thought: I need to craft brown_wool, but I don't have any. The first step is to craft white_wool, which requires placing 4 string in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. I will first move the string from slot 45 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
